title: Cat Age to Human Years Converter

seo.title: Cat Age Calculator | Convert Cat Years to Human Years
seo.description: Turn cat age into an equivalent human age using a vet-informed conversion curve.

summary: Translate your cat's age into human years for quick health and life-stage context.
formula: const years = Math.max(cat_years, 0); const human_years = years <= 1 ? 15 * years : 15 + 9 + (years - 2) * 4; return { human_years };

faq.a: No. It is a simplified curve for quick context, not a veterinary diagnostic.
Once a year is fine. Recalculate sooner if you are planning diet or health changes.
